STEVE SPANGLER: Well you've
asked for magic and today

you're going to get it because
we're looking at the things
that float.

You know magicians can take
ordinary objects like this

completely ordinary piece of
rope and cause it to float in
the air because of their magic.
Watch.

I'm going cause it to float
in the air, watch.
I'll put a spell it, float.
[SINGING]
do, do, do, do.
Isn't that amazing?

And then they can
break the spell.
Break the spell.

Faquirs would be in the

do, do, do, do.

do, do, do, do, do.

fired.

For the last 20 years, I've

into unforgettable learning
experiences.

I have an amazing team who will
do whatever it takes to

affect the way people
think about science.

And to do that I only
have one motto.

Make it big, do it right,
